item.title: Meetup 8
item.description: Sequence to Sequence Models: A Review Presenter: Cao Vu Dung In this seminar, we will explore several important applications of the fundamental RNN models for various critical tasks including image captioning, machine translation, and speech recognition. First, a brief review of the RNN models is presented to provide the prerequisite and essential knowledge of RNN. In the main part, we will dig deep into the major cutting-edge algorithms and techniques for the tasks of image captioning, machine translation, and speech recognition through reviewing a number of recent influential papers on sequence to sequence models that have achieved the state-of-the-art accuracy and performance.
